column4: hi, is there a limited number of partitions i can have on my sata drive? i couldn't make more than 4 primary parts with gparted and couldn't figure out how to make an extended part. then i tried with disk drake and made more parts but now in the ubuntu installer, i can't see the partition table at all ???
I think you might be limited to 4 primary.  Try making logicals.
can i install onto logicals? (ie. use them as / ) and how do i make them?
